sent.orig: Think&Do configuration and control software selected in the control system, so we program with flowchart.
sent.trans: 论文同时选用Think&Do作为控制系统组态软件，采用流程图编程方式。

sent.orig: Ever, I love deeply most of girl, I silently think of you.
sent.trans: 曾经，我最深爱的女孩，我深深的想念(THINK是不是想写MISS)你。

sent.orig: Think of lift, think of thrust, think of innovation without the benefit of an industrial policy.
sent.trans: 考虑垂直提升，向前猛冲，或是产业政策都不愿意补助的各种革新方案吧。

sent.orig: Think longer, think smarter and think bigger and you'll plan wisely. Plan longer, smarter and bigger.
sent.trans: 想得更长远，更聪明，更全面——这样你就能计划得更明智。要计划得更长远，更聪明，更全面。

sent.orig: Think of me, think of me fondly, when we've said good-bye.
sent.trans: 想起我，深情地想起我，当我们已经互相道别。
